titleStmt.title: Certain propositions relating to the Scots plantation of Caledonia, and the national address for supporting thereof breifly offered to publick view, for removing of mistakes and prejudices.
Certain propositions relating to the Scots plantation of Caledonia, and the national address for supporting thereof breifly offered to publick view, for removing of mistakes and prejudices.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, stained, creased, and faded, with loss of text; best copy available for photographing.
Formerly identified as Wing C1732 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
